subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Lockouts
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: With the lockout over, the frenzy of assembling 32 rosters begins. One agent said it was “like New Year’s Eve and the new millennium all rolled into one.”
snippet: With the lockout over, the frenzy of assembling 32 rosters begins. One agent said it was “like New Year’s Eve and the new millennium all rolled into one.”
